problem: 如图,在山坡上种树,要求株距(相邻两树间的水平距离)是6米,测得斜坡的坡度为1:2.4,则斜坡上相邻两树间的坡面距离是()
comment: 本题考查了坡度和坡角的知识1解答本题的关键是掌握坡度构造直角三角形,以及勾股定理的应用.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, to plant trees on a hillside, the plant spacing (the horizontal distance between two adjacent trees) is required to be N_0, and the slope of the slope is measured as N_1:N_2, then the slope distance between two adjacent trees on the slope is ()
